review_text: good location, nice place
Great location. Easy access to shops, restaurants. Clean and Spacious. Very responsive. I plan to stay again in the future.

Can’t beat the location in terms of walkability to the slopes or downtown. A quiet and peaceful area.
The hosts are excellent communicators and extremely helpful.
I try to stay at Joel + Sandra’s whenever I visit Breckenridge! They are great hosts and their place is perfect!!
Great place! awesome hot tubs, pools, steam rooms, and saunas. heated parking, walk to the slopes and bars. the hosts were very easy to communicate with. very happy with our stay!

We had a wonderful stay here. The check in process was seamless. Sandra provided amazing clear instructions that made it effortless on our end. Kitchen had some basic cooking items we could use to make sandwiches. Very walkable nearby with lots of restaurants choose from.

Location was perfect and free bus service was right across the street. Everything you need for a family ski trip was within walking distance or accessible by free bus. Right on peak 9. Lots of amenities at the location such as free games like pool/ billiards as well as arcade games for free like Pac-Man and bong. There is also a gym, steam room, swimming pool and hot tub.
Projection screen if you want a nice movie night. Place is great for a couple but can feel a bit tight for more than 2 especially when you start having things like snowboard and ski equipment with you. We had 3 in our group my husband and I + our teen son. We managed quite well there but place to move around became tight once they rented their equipment & bought it back to the room. We would stay again if going back to Breckenridge.
Great little studio.
Everything was amazing!!! Perfect family vacation.
This was a beautiful place in a fantastic location. Thanks so much!
Joel and Sandra are very responsive and get back to you quickly with any questions. Location was ideal and convenient to the Mountain.
The location of the condo is phenomenal. Great communication from start-to-finish. Overall a great experience.
Beautiful ski in , ski out place. Clean, easy to check in, great location

A great place with an even better location! Joel & Sandra’s place was very clean and welcoming. They were responsive to our questions and proactive in reaching out prior to our stay. We felt right at home and had everything we needed. Their place has an awesome view. We would definitely stay again!

Everything about our stay was wonderful. From the communication early on to the check out process. It was the perfect place for a lovely 2 days at Breckenridge. The location to the slope/lift was amazing and made for such an awesome experience. And the place was super clean! We would definitely stay there again!
I visit Breck frequently and I always try to stay at Joel + Sandra’s place if it’s available. Great place, great hosts. 100% recommend.

Joel & Sandra's place is AMAZING. Great location. Everything one would need is right at their place or walkable. Description of their property is on point. When we first walked in, it was clean and welcoming. They are literally steps away from ski rentals and the Quicksilver Lift. I appreciate their quick response and communication.
Joel and Sandra's studio was just what my son and I were looking for for his first experience skiing out west. Great location and was a great "home base" for an excellent Breckenridge vaca!
Perfect location for hopping on the Quicksilver lift. Literally ski in/ski out. Walkable to everything! Spotless place and amazing amenities! We would definitely stay here again.
Great location literally steps from the quicksilver lift! Multiple hot tubs for plenty of relaxation after a long day on the slopes! Will book again next year if available!

The stay was perfect! Wonderful location, at peak 9 close to everything close to everything! Equipped kitchen, double bed, spacious bathroom and sofa bed! fit 4 people perfectly! The very attentive Joel from the beginning! Thank you so much for staying!
Joel + Sandra’s place was great. Close to the slope, clean, friendly people!

We had a great, short stay at Joel & Sandra's place. We are a family of 4 and have stayed in MANY places around Breck since we travel up for kid ski programs on the weekends. The location of this unit could not be beat--very walkable to Main Street Breck and Peak 9 base (very close to Quicksilver lift). The unit itself was clean and cozy--but spacious enough for us. We really appreciated the underground, temp controlled parking. And we loved the pool/hot tubs (there are 4 outdoor hot tubs!) and the game room on the 1st floor. Joel + Sandra share helpful information and clear instructions on the digital key + parking info--I recommend to read in advance and you'll be all set.
Fantastic location! Right at the bottom of Peak 9. Easy & walkable access to lifts and restaurants. Coffee shop across the street. Cozy place with lots of natural light.
Nice place! Very clean and well kept.

Getting into the room was the biggest challenge, but the hosts were responsive and it all worked out. Had to download and reinstall the app for the digital key several times before it worked on the room keypad. Not a fan of the 10am checkout time either. Great value for an overnighter though! Clean, cozy, and super convenient to access Peak 9 base!
Perfect location in Villages. Can see lift out window. Beautiful view and few minute walk to Main Street and restaurants.
Great place, great atmosphere, great host, couldn’t ask for anything else will definitely be back!

We have been coming to Breck 20+ years. This place is right in the heart of everything from skiing, to shopping, and eating. Everything is a short walk away. We parked our truck in the covered garage and never had to use it again. The building has great amenities as well. Joel and Sandra gave a lot of info that made getting in and out of the property super easy.
Great location, close to everything. Host’s were very responsive. The pool, sauna, hot tub were great after skiing. Would definitely book again.

Absolutely loved joel + sandra studio. Family of four stayed there did not feel crowded and great location!!! It’s a great place for kids to stay a lot of other activities other than Skiing. We will be returning customers.
Great location and super cute place!
Beautiful view

Great little cozy spot for a ski in and ski out! The amenities were great and easy to get to. Joel and Sandra’s place was clean, comfy, and just right for what we were looking for. It was a great to be able to snap such a great little spot for our ski trip! Joel was very responsive when we had a small issue getting out of the secured garage. He answered right away and was able to solve the problem almost immediately! :)
Great location! Cute and quaint spot - perfect for my husband and I.
Very wonderful people. They helped us with everything from parking to knowing how to check in. The amenities that were listed show just how great a place this was.

We traveled from Texas hoping to get a taste of “White Christmas” in early December. Success! Timely snowfall along with spectacular Mountain Views and charming Breckenridge made this a wonderful trip. The condo was super clean and a 2-minute walk from the best Breckenridge has to offer. We appreciated a useful kitchen, plenty of hot water, and a roomy bathroom. (My wife made use of the full tub.)
The building features a small store in the lobby but it offers only the most essential items.
If you ski, the location cannot be beat. We didn’t ski but we walked around town each day and the condo location was superb. Joel + Sandra were friendly and prompt in our communication. We’d definitely return to this particular condo in the future.
.
Enjoyed our stay very much and would highly recommend!

loved this place! it was so close to town and the amenities were awesome. the unit was amazing as well, very spacious, convenient, and clean. we loved that there was a mattress pad to put on top of the pullout couch, it made a huge difference. joel and sandra were very helpful and responsive to all of my questions and quickly resolved an issue we had while checking in. would definitely stay again!

Loved the place! Very cozy and it has everything you need! Kitchen was very convenient, the place was very clean.
We will definitely come back!

Right in the heart of Breckenridge! Blowing snow on the ski hill right outside our window and all the restaurants, shops and bars within a block to a mile from the room. The hot tubs were great to relax in at night or in the morning. The hosts were so responsive and even let us know we could stay an extra night or two which we did stay one extra night last minute. Great place for sure! Also the underground parking was awesome to not worry about our vehicle!

At first the No a/c situation has us worried but we had NO issues at all with the air bnb temperature inside. It felt cool and warm for our comfort. The air bnb was really nice! Awesome views of the mountains as well as multiple hot tubs any member of the family can use! Even if it’s hot or freezing cold outside. Will definitely be willing to stay here again, thank you Joel & Sandra for making this vacation memorable!
great place, helpful hosts! all around good experience
Nice location, well stocked kitchen & bathroom. The tv and other amenities were great.
The location was great and very easy to get around town walking. Great amenities as well.

location, location, location! my wife and I have been to Breck 3 years running now. the spot is perfect for a couple to get away from life. Joel was awesome to help us out, would stay again in a heart beat!
Joel and Sandra’s place was perfect for our stay! Location was perfect and was very clean. Would highly recommend for your next stay in Breck!

We had a wonderful time staying in Joel and Sandra’s place! Super close walk to Breckenridge shops, restaurants, and trails. Sandra had great instructions for getting into the building and was really easy to communicate with. Would love to come back again!

This is the first time I have traveled alone, and I really enjoyed the mountains and the environment. I’ll definitely be back. The village has lots to do, and is very comfortable and welcoming. Thanks for allowing me to stay.
We had a minor change in plans and Joel and Sandra were issued us a refund for the unneeded parking. Thank you!!

We had a lovely stay in Breckenridge! We loved how close the Airbnb was to everything downtown, it was very walkable and there were many fun things to do very close by. Joel and Sandra left very detailed instructions that were easy to follow. We also loved all the amenities - hot tub, pool, and fitness center.
great location, nice amenities, was a little hard to find the building, but such a lovely stay
Joel and Sandra communication was excellent. Their place was one of the cleanest places we have stayed. Only regret was we only stayed one night but will be back. Thank you for sharing your place.
Loved it, will put it on the list for a return visit
The place was really nice! Only thing was there’s no air conditioning but there is multiple fans so we were able to keep it cool still

Had a great stay at Joel and Sandra’s place for the Oktoberfest weekend. Hosts were very responsive. Lots of great amenities in the building (swimming pool, hot tubs and arcade games). Walkable to main street, restaurants and shops! Looking forward to coming back during ski season.
Great place, so accessible & walkable to everything in town!
This stay was clean, comfortable, close to the walking strip of Breck. Paid parking garage for overnight. Just like the photos. Hosts were nice. Check-in instructions were unnecessarily complicated.
This was a great place to stay while exploring Breckenridge. Super close to restaurants and shopping. Would highly recommend!
Great place to stay

The room is exactly the way it looks in the pictures very clean everything you need.
Sauna and steam room for an extra bonus, hottubstubs, pools, , game rooms everything very lovely.
Within walking distance for everything Breckenridge .
The only hiccup is actually getting into the room. Again at no fault of the owners, their explanation is spot on, but it takes a while to actually get into the room and after a 12 hour train ride and an hour and a half drive the only thing we wanted to do was lay down on the bed, but it’s quite the process to get into the actual room . So for future guest, I would stress that you’re not going to get in right a way but once you do, everything is fantastic. The owners always communicated very swiftly and had great descriptions and recommendations. If you were looking for a prime location in Breckenridge, this space is totally it.

Joel and Sandra have a great place in Breck. Check-in instructions were detailed and the hosts were very responsive when I had a question. Location is superb and the place was very clean. We took advantage of the swimming pool and hot tub (which we happened to have to ourselves!) We liked having the hosts' recommendations for dining and doing. Definitely recommend.
Great!
The room was clean and well-kept. It felt cozy. The host did a great job of explaining all the details of checking in and getting around the complex. It was much appreciated.

Very nice room in the village and although I came in the summer, it is also right next to the ski lift. Hopefully will stay again in the winter for a great experience !
The hot tub and pool area was also very nice !

I truly did not care for this modern way of getting into the building by downloading an app on your cell phone. you had to use your cell phone in the elevator and your door to get in. Joe went above and beyond and got me a key card which was way more helpful. I would definitely stay there again. I’ll be back there next year to do a race and I will look to see if it’s available during that time.

The condo was right in the middle of Breckenridge. It was a pleasant walk to the Gondola, stores, and great restaurants. Plus there was a fun fine art festival happening just steps from the condo on the weekend we were there.
Highly recommend!
Great location!

Great location, walkable, and clean. Only reason I didn’t do 5 stars was parking garage door wouldn’t let us out. 2 people in place couldn’t help. Finally worker coming in opened door and backed up to let us out. So if ever an issue again I’d recommend that. Unfortunately we saw one person come in so new it worked but had to wait 30 min for next person to come. Owners were very responsive.

This was the best airB&B experience we have had and the cleanest place we have stayed. Great location for walking around town. Despite a lot going on outside, the room is quiet. The building’s health club is clean and updated. It’s a studio but the bathroom closet and kitchen were good sizes so it didn’t feel cramped. There was a lot of attention to detail with newer linens and all the necessities.
Great place to spend the night in Breck. Highlight was the pool and hot tub space - outdoors! Walkable to shops and restaurants.
Joel and Sandra were wonderful hosts! They were incredibly attentive and helpful and I am very grateful for their responsiveness. The stay was cozy and beautiful, perfect for a mountain getaway!

This was our second time staying here and we just love it! The pools, hot tubs and firepit are so relaxing. Easy to walk to everything Breck has to offer. Very responsive hosts. We’ll never stay anywhere else when visiting Breck!
This was our second stay here. Location is unbeatable which is why we booked a second time. A 1 minute walk to Main Street and right next to the river! Definitely would stay again!
Great location in Breck! Place was spotless, and Joel was extremely helpful and responsive when a question came up. Would book again!

We had a great time in Breckenridge and at Joel and Sandra’s place! It was extremely walkable to activities, restaurants, and Main Street shopping. We enjoyed coming “home” to the hot tubs after many outdoor adventures. Perfect space for the two of us.

We made a last minute decision to drive to Breckenridge for one night after a wedding in Colorado Springs. It was the best decision! Our two boys loved the pool and hot tubs and the nearby walking paths. It was so close to downtown and walkable. The place was small, but very clean. It might not have been as comfortable for a longer stay with 4 of us, but it was perfect for the one night. The step by step directions on how to get there and in were a lot, but very clear and easy to follow. The host was super responsive when I didn’t follow the instructions and very kind in their response.
Loved the location of the place. Easy to walk everywhere we wanted to go!

The place was amazing. we've stayed in multiple locations in Breckenridge, and this, by far, has been our favorite location! pefect walking distance to Main Street, even close to walking trails in the woods! will definitely be booking on our next visit!
Wonderful spot within walking distance of all the amenities in town. We loved enjoying the spa/pool area.would definitely book again!

Perfect mountain getaway for our family of four. We thoroughly enjoyed our stay in Breckenridge. Beautiful view of the mountains and hiking trails within walking distance from the condo. Everything you need available at the condo! We would definitely recommend this place.
The perfect mountain getaway! The place was very clean, cozy and conveniently located. Would recommend!
Can't beat this location! Very walkable and condo was perfect for what we needed. Will definitely be coming back during ski season!
Great location with great amenities! Well kept and cozy apartment with nice bathroom. Fantastic mountain views. Would stay again!

joel & sandra had a wonderful place to stay at the south end of breckenridge main st and our stay was wonderful! adequately described, the condo was perfect for what we needed and i would absolutely stay w them again! we arrived early and we’re able to get checked in before our stay was supposed to start and they were quick to get back w me to communicate how to check in:) wonderful place & good hosts!
Perfect location! Very convenient and everything in the town was walkable. The studio was in a great facility that felt comfortable and safe.

We absolutely loved our stay! It was comfortable and cozy, clean, walking distance to everything! Will definitely come back soon!
Also, loved the TV and channels when we just felt like chilling out for a lil bit.

Place was great. The location is right downtown and within walking distance of everything you could need. Host was so friendly and very quick to respond when we had questions, though we had few because instructions were so thorough!

This place was very nice and so close to all the shops and restaurants. The condo had a lot of maintenance going on. The gym/pool area was closed and the water was shut off for a period of one day. The front desk gave us ticket passes for a breck Rec pass so we drove to use the hot tub there.
This wasn’t in the control of Joel and Sandra and they did everything perfect from their end.
Great response time, a beautiful view and a clean place to stay!
Loved being here!
Joel & Sandra’s place was perfect for us. The Villages has great amenities and perfectly located. Highly recommend!!

This is a very cute, comfortable place, so close to the mountain, as well as equally close to shops, and the main strip in Breckenridge. Joel and Sandra were super responsive and made our trip effortless. We appreciated the parking option for our vehicle. We will look at staying at Joel and Sandra‘s place again on our future trips back to the mountain!
Great place to stay! Close to the lifts and walking distance to lots of restaurants and shops! Excellent stay for the price! Had a great day skiing

I can’t say enough about Joel and Sandra’s condo in Breckenridge. I stayed for 1 night, but wish I could have stayed longer. I had a fabulous and relaxing stay. The amenities were wonderful and within walking distance to everything. Hosts were very responsive and proactive. I hope to return soon!
Loved our time at Joel & Sandra’s place, the room was cozy, clean and has an amazing view of the mountains!

Apartment was perfect for our family for a few days of skiing. It was clean and everything was in great working order. Enjoyed our time there and the instructions were clear on how to get into the apartment and how to leave it.
Close to lifts and restaurants. They were very friendly when we called with questions.

This place is wonderful and so centrally located to town and Peak 9 chair lift. It was very clean and the amenities were great. Joel + Sandra were awesome to deal with and communicated very well. Totally recommend for a small party to pool here for their Breckenridge adventure.

Third time staying at this property and it never disappoints. Location could not be better whether you are a skier or just wanting to hit the town. Always clean, comfortable with everything you need. Jacuzzi/Pool area newly remodeled and very nice. Will definitely be back! Highly recommended.
Perfect location! Easy check in instructions! Would definitely stay here again!
Awesome location, great amenities, super responsive and helpful hosts! 10/10 recommend!

This place is awesome! Super clean and easy to find, access the parking, and get to the room. Room was perfectly described. The Village grounds are well maintained and the pool and hot tub were great for after skiing. Very close walk to all the great restaurants and shopping. Would definitely recommend!

I can’t say enough good things about this trip! Not only was the location as perfect as you can get but the hosts were incredibly helpful! Such a beautiful little place right at the base of the ski lift and right across the street from the Main Street shops. Even the amenities in the complex were better than most places I’ve stayed at before! All around great place!

I’ve stayed at Joel + Sandra’s place a number of times now, and always look to see if I can find availability there when I stay in Breckenridge. It’s perfectly situated in the village and at the base of Peak 9. It’s clean and bright and lovely, and Joel + Sandra are awesome hosts.
Great location, clean & well appointed.

Loved our stay. Joel & Sandra were exceptional to communicate with, extremely responsive. The location was perfect and everything was there that we needed. I was so happy to see there was spices and tinfoil, making cooking a breeze. I would highly recommend this unit.

Perfect location for walking to Quicksilver Chair and everything in Main Street. Comfy bed, all that we needed, could even see onto the run. Lots of channels available on TV. Very fast WiFi. Parking in basement. No road noise as apartment is to the back side. Skis can be stored in room by reception so don't have to take them to the room or leave in car. If lift lines are long at weekends on Quicksilver you can always jump on a freeride Gray bus and go up to Snowflake lift which never has a line.
Great location. Convenient parking with additional fee. Clean and easy and would totally come back.

This was an amazing place to stay and I would 100% stay here again! Their instructions were clear, the room was awesome and had great views, and right in the middle of everything. Amazing hosts!! The amenities in the building were so nice after a day of skiing and you didn’t have to walk to the lifts!
Great place to stay! Walking distance to everything in Breck.

I’ve stayed here several times now and it’s always a delight. Joel + Sandra are terrific hosts and their place is A+. I highly recommend and I always look to see if it’s available when I come out to Breckinridge.
Joel and Sandra were great hosts. They quickly responded to our messages and were very friendly!
This place was an amazing location!! Super close to the lift and very close to the hot tub and health club area. All you need for a great ski trip!
We really enjoyed our stay! Very close to everything from the ski lifts, to tap houses, to restaurants etc!!!

This is the perfect place for a Breckenridge winter stay! Great location, walkable to the mountain and downtown, and excellent building amenities. A seamless place to stay for both Skiing and exploring the town. Very much looking forward to returning!

Came here for a couple days to ski. Wish I could’ve stayed longer. The place is fantastic all around. Great kitchen for a studio. Great access to Breck.
The building staff were also all very kind.
Would definitely come back!

Wonderful location, close to everything short walk to lift line and all things in town also. Very clean, great amenities, everything we needed for our stay. Also great response time from the host on all of our questions. Great vacation for me and my husband while skiing in Breck!
our stay at joel and sandra’s was amazing!! best possible location and they were extremely helpful and responsive. would definitely come stay again!

10/10 recommend Joel and Sandra’s place! They are the most kind, responsive hosts and the stay was everything we could have asked for. Perfect location to ski + walking distance to anything in town. We really enjoyed the use of all the amenities (sauna, steam room, hot tub, very clean gym). Thanks so much for a great stay - will definitely book again!!
Extremely easy to check in, perfect location, well equipped and perfectly cozy for two people- couldn’t recommend enough!
Excellent layout for studio condo! We loved it!!

A very clean, convenient, family friendly studio, and the pictures and description are spot on. It can be a little bit hard to find the check-in location at first, but once your in, everything is smooth. Parking is somewhat limited, and you may need to park a small distance from the elevators to the room, but it’s all covered/heated, and you probably won’t even need to take your car out once you’re there. Location is a good mix of proximity to town, with about a 5-10 min walk to the lift, especially for the price. You can pretty much be anywhere in Town within 10-15 min of walking, but you’re within 5 of several restaurants and stores already. If you bring your own equipment, you will need to walk 5-10 min with it in order to get to the base of the lift and will have to store it in the room or pay for overnight storage. The amenities in the building are awesome, and overall this is one of the most family friendly locations but not the best ski in/ski out set up we’ve seen in Breck
Great studio right at the base of Peak 9. Perfect location in the heart of Breckenridge. Great facility and amenities in the pool/spa/jacuzzi area.

We are local Coloradoans but wanted time away in the mountains for Christmas, Joel and Sandra's was perfect!
Really quant place with comfy furniture, very clean, awesome amenities, and easy access to so many shops and restaurants.
As skiers, it was so nice to have the heated underground parking. We were also shocked how close everything was in the building (garage, elevator, hot tub, trash, etc) which just made it so convenient after a long tiring day.
We will definitely be back again!

Location of condo is an A+, you can easily walk to the Quicksilver lift from the condo with all your ski/snowboard gear. We had below 0 temps during our stay and having the temperature controlled garage was wonderful. Main Street is just steps away and so is the lift, in other words it is the best of both worlds. The hot tub area has been recently renovated and is top notch.

Great location and amenities in a building that also looks like it runs as an owner operated hotel, which means it has most of the amenities of a hotel. Pool/spa area looks like it was recently renovated. Four separate outdoor hot tubs meant there was always a quiet one to relax in no matter how many groups were there.
Short walk out the back door to the base of the Quicksilver lift made it easy to roll out of bed late and still catch first chairs and also get back if you need a mid-day break or lunch in the unit.
Probably worth noting that hallway noise is noticeable if you’re a light sleeper. It was a holiday week though so a bit of noise is to be expected no matter where you’re staying. I’m a heavy sleeper and had no issues sleeping straight through once I fell asleep.
Overall great location that I’d recommend for couples or families with up to 1-2 smaller kids.
Great location right on peak 9! Super nice and cozy condo too. Extremely clean as well. Wish I could have stayed there longer!
Great place to stay. Has everything you need for a great stay. Very close to lifts.

This was the perfect Airbnb for 4 people, right in the village. Convenient for rentals, ski-in ski-out, and local restaurants. The room was very clean and the hosts were responsive and helpful. The facilities were very nice!
Joel & Sandra’s place was perfectly located in the heart of Breckenridge, extremely clean and cozy. Great views of the mountains and the slopes! Highly recommend! Would stay here again.
Loved our stay! We will book again if there are openings. Thanks for having us.

Perfect Ski In/Out Peak 9 location. Ski rental and lift within walking distance. Free public transportation and close public parking during the day in Loft F. The amenities are great after a long day of skiing. Hot tubs, Sauna and Steam Room was definitely a plus. Very clean. Will definitely be back!!!

This place was an awesome place to stay at. Spent a few days on the slopes to bond with my son. We had great time being right there by the lifts and walking distance to many restaurants. Would definitely stay here again. Thank you Joel and Sandra.
This place is in the perfect location - walking distance to the ski lift & to the adorable downtown area. Excellent amenities too!
Can't get any better than this place! Great location and communication from the host! We will definitely be back!
Very thorough communication. Great location and clean. Enjoyed our stay. Garage parking is very tight though, and if busy, difficult to find a spot.

Do not hesitate to book this stay. Smooth process to get into room/parking garage. Room was spotless and cozy. Location was perfect to do everything Breckenridge has to offer! We will be back for sure!!
10/10 would recommend amazing view to wake up too along with all the necessities for our stay!
Really seamless experience and wonderful location! Housekeeper left the place sparkling and we had no hitches. I recommend this place to others breezing through. 😊
We had an amazing time staying at Joel and Sandra’s place! Great price, east check in and you can’t bear the location. I’d recommend Joel and Sandra’s place to anyone looking to stay in Breckinridge.
I loved everything about it. I would rent again
Beautiful place, very close to main st and perfect spot!
Very comfortable and clean place! Highly recommend this getaway for anyone! Joel and Sandra are very responsive!
This was great for a little mountain getaway! The location was perfect, place was clean, and the hosts were super helpful throughout the process!
Great little place, great stay! Convenient location, beautiful pool area and fitness center. Definitely recommend!
Phenomenal host, great directions, conveniently located, super clean and had everything we needed!

Great location! Walkable to everything. These hosts are on top if it. Very prompt communication and support when I forgot to pay for my parking pass. Side note: I have not been able to sleep for 5 nights, and I slept in this bed for 10 hours! Very comfy. And the instructions were detailed and easy to make the stay pleasure-able. Will def visit again during ski season!!!
Great view, great amenities, great location
Great place, great location!

Perfect location walkable to the downtown area. Check in took a little figuring out but the instructions sent to me ahead of time were very clear, step-by-step. Joel and Sandra were very responsive when I messaged them. This place is a studio but has everything you pretty much need to kick up your feet and relax between your adventures.

Lovely studio in the heart of Breckenridge! The space has everything you need and is walkable to the entire town. My only complain is that the studio wasn't as updated as it seemed in the pictures. Parking is available for an extra fee.

Great stay. Impeccable location, short easy walk to food, libations, and more. Comfortable clean room with everything we needed. Quiet and safe. We loved the hot tubs. Check-in was a bit confusing but hosts were quick to respond and very helpful. Would def recommend!
Great place and centrally located for lots of fun options!!
Super cute condo in a great location!

This is really a great stay with a very communicative post! Located at the top of Breckenridge just off of Main Street with great amenities and very clean facility. New pool, children’s playing area, free game systems, for hot tubs with sauna and steam room.
Joel and Sandra were great and very flexible with my stay and willing to work with me so I could make it in time to a wedding. The place has a lot of space and was nice and clean.
Awesome place for a great price

Great location with everything close by. The check-in process was very cumbersome. There were 9 parking passes and five room keys. Our lock box had to be reset in order to get the correct parking permit. One room key didn't work and the front desk advised they couldn't help with resetting it.
Great location and a wonderful place to stay!

Joel and Sandra are wonderful hosts! Great communication and very prompt with replies. The apartment is super clean and has a lot of extra touches that make it comfortable. Nice set up in the bathroom with separate space for shower, toilet and sinks.
Very clean + comfortable! Great location, close to everything.
Lovely place to stay, super close to the ski slopes and super friendly and responsive hosts!
Super clean studio condo, perfect for the two of us. Walking distance to everything in Breck! Enjoyed our stay, super easy check-in and check-out. We will be back again next year!
Great for the price, but got a bit of a list of things to do on check out that was somewhat annoying. Overall solid!

I love this place so much. So comfortable and nice, gorgeous mountain view, perfect setup, all the stuff I want as a hiker - easy laundry room access, kitchen, etc. Finding it is a tiny bit wonky but that's OK! also in the center of Breck, which rules

We loved the location and convenience of this Airbnb. The check in process and key cards to get into the unit were the only issue we had. The key cards stopped working after the first couple of days due to getting demagnetized. Joel quickly was able to get in touch with the HOA to get us new ones. But something to keep in mind is that the cards shouldn’t be kept near other batteries or magnets or this could happen.

The place was perfect for what we were looking for. It’s right in the village and within easy walking distance of the bars and restaurants on Main St. The hosts were also excellent communicators. I will plan to return.

This place was true to every picture! Extremely clean and was perfect for a couple day stay. The perfect location too! Short walk or drive to town.

The condo was great, everything we needed and more! My sister and I only stayed for one night while traveling through town and didn’t use many of the amenities, but we would definitely stay here again! Very comfortable and clean plus quick and easy communication with Joe & Steph.

We just finished a wonderful stay in Breckenridge. The condo was amazing! Modern and with all the amenities you could need. The hosts Steph and Joe were fabulous -- always available, and super helpful. The condo was even more beautiful and functional than the pictures showed and exceeded our expectations. Great location!!! The condo was conveniently located very close to a bus stop that would take you into town for free. Would recommend this place to anyone and everyone I know who is visiting Breckenridge. Thank you Steph and Joe!!!!

Joe & Steph’s place is convenient, clean, and comfy! We had a rental car so we didn’t try to navigate the bus. The condo was cool, even in the heat of the summer. Parking and check in is super easy. I appreciate the great place to stay!
Location is great and easy to find. The condo is very modern and spacious! There is also plenty of parking and check in/out was a breeze. We will definitely book again!

Joe & Steph have a very nice apartment. It was very clean and the location was great. It took us 15 minutes to walk to Main St. The area around the apartment was very quiet and relaxing. We enjoyed our time there immensely!
Great location. Clean and updated ground floor unit. Quick response times and flexibility when we made a request on the last day.
Great, clean place in an awesome location.

We loved staying at Joe and Steph’s place! It was super clean and recently renovated with updated appliances. It was the perfect jumping off point for exploring the surrounding area. The bed was comfy and the pull down shade made the bedroom dark for sleeping. The kitchen had all of the essentials to make simple dinners at home. We really enjoyed our summer stay and hope to stay here again for a ski trip! It’s in a great location near Peak 8 with easy ski in/ski out access.
Great place and great location to walk to town in the summer:)
Joe and Steph's place was absolutely perfect. They were attentive and helpful. If you're looking for a getaway in Breck, this is the place you want!
Beautifully updated apartment! It offered everything we needed. Very cozy and comfortable. High end finishes were lovely. Great place to stay!

We visited in the summer. I gave 5 stars on everything except value only because I really don’t know how the cost stacks up against other places. This was such a nice and beautiful condo. The check in / check out was super easy. Communication with Steph and Joe was quick and easy and they gave lots of good info on the area. It really is walking distance to Breck Fun Park. The condo is a great fit for a couple. We had our young-ish son with us and he slept on the sofa. If you have been considering booking this place stop considering and just book it.

Joe and Steph saved our vacation! We we're unable to get into the Airbnb we had rented so at 8pm that night we sent a message to them asking if we could stay at their place. They responded very quickly and were willing to work with us given the uncertainty in our plans. The place was spotless, had all the amenities you could want and was very convenient for hanging out in Breckenridge. Honestly, this was the best experience with a host I have had!

We had a great time in this condo! It is clean and beautifully decorated. The hosts are friendly though we didn’t have any problems so didn’t have to maintain contact. This place is in a prime but quiet location. We used the kitchen a lot and one thing we found was that the smoke alarm is sensitive. My husband opened the oven a little too quickly twice and the steam set the alarm off so be mindful of that! This isn’t a negative, just something that I thought I should mention. We can’t wait to travel back to Peak 8 and enjoy Breck!

This is a fabulous place! Everything was thought of. Beautifully decorated, impeccably clean, modern touches. They welcomed us at the last minute and we are so grateful they did. If you want a lovely place to rest and renew, this is it.
Charming place, stellar location— would stay here again.
Very clean, great location and although the weather was rainy all weekend, we really enjoyed our stay! Will definitely stay again.
Amazing place
Great and comfortable place in a beautiful part of Breckenridge, wouldn't mind coming back.
Well located 1 BR condo located within a few minute walk to the lower 4 o’clock/ snowflake lit as well as the bus stop. Well appointed with attentive hosts.
If u love skiing this is the place to be

Incredible ski-in ski-out location for those hoping to hit the slopes. Updated space and everything was very clean! Great communication and awesome guest guide book for local tips. Would definitely come back and recommend to others!
Joe and Steph’s place was great! Lots of small touches, great location and super comfortable! We will definitely be back!

Perfect location
Clean and modern
Lovely and cozy! Definitely will book again!
Wonderful, comfortable and immaculately clean. Hope to come back soon.

Joe & Steph were extremely helpful and proactive answering any questions that I had. The unit is steps away from 4 O'clock run making it truly a ski in ski out location. Everything is newly renovated and clean. There is a huge smart TV which is great to watch after a long day on the slopes. I would highly recommend staying here!
Would recommend staying here, very clean and conveniently located.
Great spot for a ski weekend!

Exactly as described. It was beautifully decorated, spotless, great amenities (kurieg was key) huge ski closet and right next to the mountain. So happy we stayed here. Would definitely come again. Highly recommend!

Lovely condo steps from the ski slopes. Cozy, nicely remodeled and contemporary with a great amenities. Steph and Joe are amazing communicators and help you every step of the way (superb “how to” manual for instance!) if you’re hitting the slopes, then their place is hard to beat. Thank you Joe and Steph, we would definitely return and recommend.

Great location close to the ski slope. Very clean and thoughtfully remodeled. We had everything we needed. Check in was easy and communication was always friendly and almost immediate. I would definitely stay in the condo again!
Steph & Joes place was awesome! Great location, super clean, and very cozy.

Joe and Steph’s place is perfect for a stay in Breck. The keyless entry and ski locker make coming and going so easy! We had 10” the night of our stay so the ski down to the run was perfect for a great powder weekend. Thanks for a modern, clean and fully stocked place to settle in for a few days.
The condo is in a great location, close to skiing. The check-in process was a breeze. The communication with Joe & Steph was great!

The place was awesome, and we sincerely appreciated the quick and thorough communication from the hosts. We loved several of their restaurant recommendations, and the location really can’t be beat. Super quick to hop the bus up to peak 8 in the morning and ski home in the afternoon. Overall 10/10 and will stay again on our next trip!
Joe & Steph’s place was the perfect home base for us for a long weekend of skiing. The location of the condo was amazing. We enjoyed our stay, the great skiing, and the town of Breck a great deal.
Great place and very clean. Easy to get to and right near the slopes. The pullout couch was just that - a pullout couch - but it was quiet and comfy

Joe and Steph have an amazing updated condo close to the slopes. It was a short walk to 4 o’clock run! It is a very cozy place to enjoy offer a full day of snowboarding. The location is perfect for the slopes and also close to town!
Very cute and comfortable condo conveniently located near the Snowflake lift. Joe & Steph were really responsive and we thoroughly enjoyed our stay. Hope to be back next year.
Nicely updated, extra clean. Great location. We would come back!

A great stay in a fantastic location! Proximity to the 4 O'clock run was amazing and makes for easy mountain access with minimal hassel. The kitchen had plenty of dishes and silverware for takeout which we appreciated since we are avoiding indoor dining due to COVID. The bedroom had a fan and humidifier available which was a welcome amenity in the dry mountain air. Will definitely be back on our next trip to Breck!
Great location Very nicely remodeled place with big TV’s and everything you need including a instant pot!

Amazing house very clean a Modern.
I felt like home.
Great location, a short walk to 4 o’clock ski run and the Snowflake lift. Newly remodeled with great decor. Joe & Steph were easy to communicate with. Definitely recommend!

What a great value. 30 sec walk to ski in ski out. With fresh powder I rode my board from the condo parking lot to the ski in area 2 of the days. I’m sure you could do that everyday mid season. This place is exactly what you would expect from the listing and I would gladly stay there again. Hosts were very responsive. Thank you Joe and Steph

Joe & Steph should be the paradigm by which all Air BnB should be measured. These guys were on it from the moment of booking. The condo was perfect for location, amenities, cleanliness, owner response time, and overall value. Incredibly close to the Four O'clock run! Easy 5 min ride into town. Can't be missed!
Super cozy, great location.

This place was perfect for us! Our kids stayed on the comfortable sleeper sofa and enjoyed the huge TV. The bedroom was also very cozy. Everything was exceptionally clean and nicely finished. We were able to ski down to the Snowflake lift but it was too early in the season to ski back to the condo as the run was closed. The bus brought us back within a 5 minute walk to home. The communication with the hosts was always prompt. We look forward to staying there again soon.

Joe & Steph’s place was great, very central to everything, downtown was only about a 5 minute drive, and the bus stop a 5 minute walk if you aren’t wanting to drive down to town.
The Nordic Center was also about a 5 min walk, and was the highlight of our trip since we were able to see a couple moose while on our hike around the grounds.
The condo itself was very up to date and the beds comfortable.
The neighbors were very nice and one was even kind enough to offer suggestions on what to do while we were visiting.
We would definitely suggest this unit to anyone visiting Breckenridge!

Nice place! Our only issue was that the thermostats were turned OFF when we arrived and it was 18 degrees out. It took hours for the place to warm up, even with the dryer and the oven on. We ended up going to bed with hot towels from the dryer but the cold still really messed up our first night's sleep. Otherwise we had no issues. The place was clean. Parking was easy and available. The kitchen was equipped with the basics but not with enough to cook from scratch. Everything was very new with higher-end finishes.
10/10 would recommend
A great location close to everything in town, very clean, great kitchen for cooking some meals in. Joe and Steph are easy to communicate with, and check-in/check-out was a breeze
Great location!

Location, location! Easiest spot to ski from. Access to ski lockers that are steps from the Peak 7 Independence chair lift. 3 bedrooms and 3 1/2 bath make this unit comfortable to spread out in! Beds are comfy. The kitchen comes equipped with Viking appliances and is well stocked.
Bathrooms are stocked with hotel size shampoo and conditioner/ only add on that would be nice is lotion ;)
Loved having access to One Ski Hill Place and using both resorts hot tubs!
Perfect ski-in ski-out location at peak 7 base! Clean, well stocked kitchen, ski locker, garage parking. Very quiet, spotless. Perfect family vacation! We would stay again!
Can't say enough about the location. We loved being so close to the lifts and rentals. Everything was super convenient! Made popping in for lunch ideal. Apres ski in the hot tub was perfect.
Great location

Perfect place for a ski vacation. Close to all the peaks, close to shops and restaurants. Literally right next to the gondola for transportation around the resort. Spacious and clean apartment, and very convenient.
Place was just as advertised and perfect location!
Just like the photos! Everything nice and clean.
Beautiful location. Patio was spacious for 5 people. Easy walk to a coffee shop and restaurant with outdoor games by the slopes.
It was a good time! We would be happy to stay again.
We enjoyed our stay. Perfect location, close to skiing and downtown Breckinridge. Free transportation into town, via Gondola or shuttle is very convenient. Would definitely stay there again.

This is a great location if you are in the area to ski, right beside the lifts and easily accessible.
There were small maintenance problems that should be addressed, broken doorknobs and window cranks. Also it is not mentioned in the description that there is no ac in the unit, however there were multiple fans so that helped cool it off. We visited in the summer.
Overall it’s a nice place.
The venue fit our family well. A few minor corrections need to be made to a window and shower drain but nothing that was terrible. Would definitely stay there again!

Great location for a getaway! Steps from the gondola on Peak 7 made for easy access to the amenities on Peak 8 and all that Main St in Breck have to offer. Condo had ample space to relax and the welcoming feel of a home. Great spot for winter or summer!
Enjoyed our stay and the condo worked perfect for us!
Great location for summer fun on the mountain… Couldn’t get any better for ski season.
Scott was wonderful to work with. Property was great, we had all that we needed and the location was perfect! Thanks for having us!
The best place that we stay in Breck. Cozy and left like a house than a condo. Beautiful place for a family with kiddos!!
Awesome place and location

You absolutely cannot beat the location on Peak 7! It was perfect for my family of 5 (2 adults, 3 kids). It is a very spacious condo & the living area feels nice and comfy. I would have rated it 5/5 but for the tired furniture and how dark it felt inside.

Key takeaways and comments:
- I'd stay again and Scott was an efficient host
- The lodge is at base of Peak 7 / Independence Super Chair. With the ski in/out locker room, can't get closer to a lift.
- Small patio off the living room, one off the master bedroom. The condo is on the first floor facing opposite the mountain and located next to the main external entrance. Someone standing on the steps on the way into the lodge would be pretty close. In the summer, maybe that would bother someone, but I didn't think it was a big deal. I think Scott priced the condo appropriately for its location within the lodge.
- Three bedrooms with en suite bathrooms were all sized well. The master bath is very nice.
- Stocked appropriately for incoming guests

Scott’s condo was perfect for a true ski in / ski out destination vacation. The lodge had very nice amenities and the access to slopes and lift were game changers.
Scott was very responsive and the property was as advertised.
We would chose this location on any return trips to Breck!
The place was exactly as described and Scott was very helpful! We would absolutely stay here again. We enjoyed our stay and had no issues.
We had a great stay! Ski in, ski out, at a comfortable, clean place, with a responsive, accommodating host was what we were looking for, and what we got! Thank you!!
The condo was perfect for an amazing ski vacation. Scott is a fantastic host and was ultra responsive to any questions or requests.
The place is very central Just to go skiing the apartment is very accessible and with all amenities! Amazing place to ski!
We loved our stay and would definitely rebook. Scott was great at communication and very helpful with anything. The location is great especially if you have kids.
Felt right at home, this place is perfect!

Perfect location for a fall girls trip! Since it was off-season, the unit was very quiet and relaxing. We utilized the free shuttle into town. We were disappointed that the BreckConnect gondola was closed.
Communication with Scott was very good. Slight mix up with the check-in instructions sent but a quick call to Scott cleared things up!
The unit just needs some TLC to make it exceptional.
Nice place, proximity to the gondola and slopes can’t be beat.

Great rooms , great location
Scott was quick to answer and take care of issues that popped up
great location and the place was beautiful

Great place, location is awesome. Off season stay was quiet and enjoyable. Felt like we had the resort to ourselves! Free shuttle service to town is easy to use and very timely. We had a mix up on our arrival day and Scott quickly saved the day and got us in a day early with no hassle. We hope to come back during ski season!
Large condo in super location. Easy to work with Scott!
Great place to stay! We had some trouble finding the keys, we called Scott and he came right over and got us situated. Awesome host!
Perfect location—my family loved the free access to transportation into town, especially the gondolas. Scott was prompt in responses and the condo was great!

We loved our stay! They have everything you could need from a ton of extra pillows, box fans, and everything for the kitchen. Check in was a little Bit of a pain but that’s not Scott’s fault. They Lobby was closed to our building.
We absolutely would stay here again.
Great place and location in Breck
Very clean place with easy access to everything in Breck.
The condo is beautiful and very roomy!
Beautiful, spacious and comfortable condo in an incredible true ski-in ski-out location. 5 stars!

This place was incredible! Ski in ski out right by sevens. Amazing hot top on the mountain. Large space, tons of room to hang in the unit. Clean and big beds! Only minor downside, check in was late (4) and check out was early (10). I wish one could be earlier or later!
We loved our stay! So convenient to the slopes, thank you!
Very nice and plenty of space! Well located for ski in and out! Furnished with everything you need.

Below par communication - waited for a response for more than 5 days besides also leaving a voicemail. Never got a response until I called again.
Place needs some TLC in general, but location, size, and mattresses were great.

Scott was a very accommodating guest. Our son got high altitude sickness and it was a challenge all weekend but Scott was amazing. We also lost a key card and he got us two replacements the same evening. The condo is perfect for a family visit. You are a steps away from Peak 7 chair, Brek Rentals and Sevens Restaurant. I highly recommend this condo for any holiday visit. You won’t be disappointed.
Great stay. Great location. Enjoyed being close to the gondola.
Very comfy beds, nicely updated kitchen and bathrooms, huge hot tub at the resort, and right at a gondola for ski season.

Scott was great with communicating when we had any questions. Loved how he had coolers we could borrow while we went hiking , along with fans we could use in the condo. Place had great space and loved the view and being next to the gondola. We have never been to this area before and loved it. We can't wait to return and would stay here again.

Great location, lots to do and the gondolas & shuttles are super convenient. Great value for how large the unit is, basically 3 master bedrooms. Carpet could be cleaned or replaced but overall nice unit.

What a wonderful condo! So spacious, well appointed and clean - the location and amenities were perfect.
We loved the gondola being right outside for a fun and easy way to enjoy downtown, and great hiking/biking trails right outside the building. Complimentary Bowling and swimming for the kids was just a short gondola ride away. Looking forward to coming back again!

If you are looking for a quiet place up in the mountain, Crystal Peak can’t be beat. Easy access to town and any other activities that you need and a great hot tub after a day of hiking to soothe our sore muscles! Great trip.
Very nice place. Thank you!

The kitchen has everything you need. There was even ground coffee. The sleeping arrangements were great. plenty of room for everyone. Loved both balconies. Very large hot tub with great scenery. We really loved having free access to bowling and swimming down the hill.

If you are looking for an INCREDIBLY CONVENIENT location in Breck, I'm not sure you can beat Crystal Peaks. That's really what this place is all about.
When you walk out of the ski lockers room, you're maybe 10-15 steps from the lift line. If you need to buy or pick up lift tickets, you can do that right around the corner. You're also only a 5 minute drive into town (or you can take a shuttle or the Gondola, which is next to the building).
The unit has 3 bedrooms, a private, full bathroom in each bedroom area, and a half-bathroom in the common area. The kitchen is large with high quality Viking appliances. The lounging area with couches isn't large, but it's definitely good enough.
We went during COVID so we had to make hot tub reservations (they limited the number of people/families who could use it at one time) and get a special key to access it, but that was never an issue. The hot tub is large and wonderful.
There are always little things that can be addressed, like burned out lightbulbs and dresser knobs that are loose or falling off, but these are all minor issues. When it comes to a large, ski in/out location, this place is amazing!
Such a great place! the location was everything 😌

Such a great location and had all of the amenities we were looking for. The beds were very comfortable and the kitchen was well stocked with everything we needed to prepare our meals. There was even a crock pot for our chicken taco night! We would definitely stay here again.

Great ski in / ski out location. Very competitively priced.
Scott's communication was absolutely flawless.
Big 3 bedroom, with much needed space. Very cozy with a lot of amenities offered.

It was a perfect set up for our group. Location is awesome!! Just walk out the back door to get on the lift. The hot tub at the building was not working during our stay, but we were able to use a sister property’s and a on call shuttle to take us. I would highly recommend this place.

We are a “first lift” family and this place was perfect. This is high value for money because of location, location, location. It’s probably the closest you can get to the mountain (about 40 feet from the door of the ski locker room to the entry of the line on Peak 7). The line tends to be shorter here in the AM because most go past it on the Gondola. We would get 7-8K of vert in before 9:30. The free Gondola to town and the free bus worked like a charm, even during COVID. Being on the backside means you have less noise at night (though it also means the views are a bit obstructed). Definitely will try to book again.
Amazing location steps from peak 7. Two comfortable king beds with accompanying bathrooms good for 2 people. Third bedroom/bathroom best for 1 guest only. Host answered all questions/concerns we had.

Scott made everything very simple for check-in and check out and did not overcomplicate anything. The unit was roomy with a very large kitchen and directly at the base of the peak 7 lift with the ski breck rental shop and lift ticket right outside. Very convenient for the avid skiier. Note that the Gondola shuts down at night so to get to town you need to either drive your own vehicle or take the Breck shttle.
Amazing location and great value during COVID. I can only imagine a much better experience with all amenities open.
Ideal location, great ski cabin feel.

Spacious, well-appointed unit with plenty of room for our family of 6. Excellent location with easy access to town, hiking, skiing, and outdoor activities. Amenities in the building were closed due to COVID-19 but would be lovely when available.

The condo was surprisingly large and could accommodate more people than we had. The location is awesome with many trailheads within a couple minutes walk.
It was very clean and we did not have any problems or concerns. What a great value. Could hope to stay again in the future.

This place was beautiful and bigger than we expected from the pictures. It was clean and had all of the basics we needed for our stay. The only thing that was a bummer was that the gondola wasn’t running and some of the amenities were hard to have access to because of the combination of the season and COVID restrictions. Overall I would say it was a good value and we would come back especially during ski season.
Superb location!!!
What an excellent location! Right next to the gondola, hiking trails and beautiful mountain views. Amazing space and value for the weekend.

I give this 4 stars because of location (5 stars), overall quality of the finishes and furniture in the unit, but this could easily be 3 stars because of the check-in issues I had (not a well organized welcome email....needs to be re-written) and because of number of issues with the unit. First, it is summer so you want to be able to open windows. The second bedroom’s windows would not open correctly so I had to take screen off and manually push it out (the handle would not catch and thus could not operate the window). The master screen door could not slide open without serious force. Then, the third bedroom has pocket doors but it took about 15 minutes to get one side to close. Then when we got it there, we had to leave it closed because it was nearly impossible to move again. The TV in the third bedroom did not work and then the last two days of our stay, we could not get DISH TV to work in any of the bedrooms. I wonder if it was a problem that the lodge was having. Also there were two doors that would not open from the outside (the hall bathroom door could not be opened from the hall and the hall closet could not be opened until maintenance guy used his screwdriver to open it and show us items inside that was for our use). Scott did answer my call about the broken items and two days later a maintenance person showed up (was supposed to schedule a time but just surprised us during lunch). He explained that bedroom door has been broken for a while and owner would not approve him repairing it. He tried to fix the window but it did not work at all. The screen door was repaired but no one ever came to check on the TV issues. So, I hate to give these honest, negative comments because this is a great property and convenience to trails and gondola is awesome. Also, the kitchen has upscale appliances and the furniture was comfortable. So much potential if the owner/manager would just pay attention to the details.
Plenty of room, nice and clean, great location. Would definitely stay again!
Great stay!
Very clean & great amenities!

Great time - ski in and ski out with s restaurant in the back.
Would recommend for large groups
Close to lift

Amazing location in terms of access to Peak 7. Condo has good kitchen, and the group generally enjoyed. Sleeping was difficult for several in our group due to poor pillows. Would expect better given how much you are paying.
Ski-in/ski-out is no exaggeration! If Peak 7 isn't for you, it's just few steps to the gondola to get to peak 8. Great spot to maximize skiing time!
Great location right at the gondola. Super easy ski rental on-site. Spacious condo. Would highly recommend.
Beautiful, spacious condo. It was spotless and the beds were SO comfortable! Definitely deserves the 5 stars we gave it!
This was a great value. The accommodations where great and their were many amenities at the facility that made the stay enjoyable.
Great location, great spacious spot! Would definitely stay here again!
Great location....huge condo and great host. Could not be better
Excellent location. We all had a great trip! We would love to come back.

OUTSTANDING PLACE !!!! Been to Breckenridge 5 times - the last two were Ski In/Ski Out locations. This one is by far the best. The location is perfect - having the ski shop right there in the facility where you can buy or rent gear as well as get your tickets is ideal. Then you can walk right next door to Sevens and get a bit to eat.
Really a great location and a great house. Margie at the front desk was awesome and most helpful with suggestions for where to go in town. Both the house and the lodge were clean and well kept. Having a pool table, Jacuzzi, lockers, etc all right there was a huge bonus. Communication with Scott prior to the stay was great as well.
The checkout was great - they let you know you dont have to do anything - housekeeping takes care of everything. REALLY WELL RUN PLACE !!!
We'll definitely come back here. HIGHLY RECOMMENDED !!!!

Absolutely fabulous spot. Walk out the door to either the lift or gondola. Ticket office and rental shop in the building. Place itself is beautiful and well provisioned.
Only suggestion for guests is to make sure you are aware of when the gondola is running when you make your plans. It doesn't run nearly as early or late as I'd have liked.

Scott's place was in a fantastic ski-in ski-out location for a great price. We have stayed at a few places within Crystal Peak Lodge over the years, and Scott's upgraded kitchen was a dream to cook in. We loved the layout with the three bedrooms down a hallway away from the living room, and a half bath in the kitchen/dining area. The condo was perfect for my husband and I, plus the two other couples who stayed with us.
The bedrooms had tons of pillows to choose from and extra covers to stay cozy at night. Every room had a humidifier which really helped us sleep in the dry conditions. Every bedroom had its own bathroom which was super convenient.
Crystal Peak Lodge itself has lots of great amenities- an outdoor hot-tub, a fitness room and shared sauna, pool, shuttle service, being right on Peak 7, in-house lift tickets & ski rentals, plus easy access to the gondola and so much more!
Hope to be back next year!

The unit is large, spacious, and in a perfect location, steps away from the lift and gondola. It is pricey because of that fact. There are ski lockers, hot tub, gym and steam room as part of Crystal Peaks. You can even rent ski equipment there. Nothing can beat the convenience of that. However, our unit was not cleaned well before our arrival - likely whoever came and did the cleaning did a poor job. Communication w the host was frustrating, but we were able to get the unit cleaned again after we checked in. You may have to send messages to the host multiple times to get a response. just FYI.
The location couldn’t be better and really enjoyed the space!

This spot was perfect for our family of 5. It would easily accommodate multiple families or many couples with the layout....we didn’t even use one of the bedrooms/bathrooms. The location was top notch - we rode the gondola to town and to Peak 8 for our kids’ snowboarding lessons. We were able to rent and store equipment right on the property. Our family loved the pool table and hot tubs. We had everything we needed to prepare meals - the kitchen is lovely. Check in and out was super convenient and easy - the hotel staff gave us good info on where to sled (there were even sleds in the condo to share!), where to grab a quick bite, etc. We will most certainly be back. Thanks so much!
This is a beautiful property with amazing ski in ski out access to Peak 7! It is a spacious unit and we were very comfortable! Highly recommend!
Scott was a great host. This was our second time to stay here. It was great both times

Had a great time and loved this condo. Plenty of space and really clean. Beds were very comfortable and this location is awesome! This would be perfect for ski season at the base of peak 7 & 8! Great location for hiking too! We will be back!!!!!
super clean and roomy. we loved it!
This place is simply perfect in every aspect. Great location, convenient layout, spacious, clean and very comfortable. Scott is a great host! Highly recommended!

Location of the unit is right next to the front door and circular driveway and road where guests are dropped off and enter the building all hours of the night. They are not quiet to the point of not being able to sleep. The unit does not have air conditioning so the windows and doors had to stay open. Even with the doors and windows closed the noise from the street and guest pick up and drop off was disruptive. The interior 3rd bedroom was unable to hear the noise my daughter reported to me however it does not have a window so it was the hottest in the unit. The unit is beautiful, the location of the building was great and the free shuttle bus is indispensable. It would be a five star rating but unfortunately the noise from the location of the unit spoiled it for us.

This is a wonderful condo with high end finishes and super clean. If you like to cook, the Viking appliances are incredible. It's roomy and has the perfect location to take the gondola down to downtown Breckenridge. Each bedroom having its own bathroom is a luxury!
Great location on Peak 7. Easy access to town on the gondolas.

The place was great...more that I expected. Lots of space, clean, nice amenities. We were running around most days, but my family did enjoy the hot tubs and pool table when we were hanging around. Easy to get to town via gondola, car, or shuttle. I will definitely stay here again on my next visit.
It was great. Everything we needed was there, full kitchen, laundry, and incidentals which I wasn't expecting. The place was beautiful and in the perfect location.
Great location right on top of peak 7. If you’re coming from out of town, use the humidifier provided in the closet. The air gets super dry when the heater’s running.

Crystal Peak is a great location for families. It’s right at the base of Peak 7, a gondola can take non-skiers easily to Peak 8 for lessons. The beds were good and the condo was quiet. There were some minor issues with housekeeping and other small details but in the end it worked out. Thanks for your hospitality Scott.

Great place! The location was second to none and the amenities of Crystal Peak Lodge were outstanding. Truly Ski in/Ski out. Sitting in one of the two hot tubs after a long day skiing as well as the awesome steam room made recovery from the activities of the day very nice. The condo itself was very clean and the rooms were great sized with comfortable beds and a first class kitchen. My kids loved drinking hot chocolate in front of the two fire places. Having the washer/dryer in the room also made it nice and allowed us to pack a little lighter because of the ability to wash and dry nightly. Check in/Check out was very easy and Scott was always available and prompt when we had a question. Long story short, my family was not ready to leave and is now spoiled as a result of our week in Scott’s place and will not stay anywhere else when we head back to Breckenridge.
